body:
Comment 3: 
Reproducible at 6g version weekly.2011-11-18 10545


$ 6g fault.go
walk [100875da8]
.   CALL l(1) tc(1)
.   .   DOTPTR l(1) tc(1)
.   .   .   NAME-main..this u(1) a(1) g(103) l(1) x(0+0) class(PPARAM) f(1) tc(1)
used(1) PTR64-*main.X
.   .   .   NAME-main.Method u(1) a(1) l(1) x(0+0)
fault.go:1: .this.Method undefined (type *X has no field or method Method)
fault.go:1: internal compiler error: walkexpr: switch 1 unknown op .this.Method()
_Labels changed: added **compilerbug**._ _Owner changed to @rsc._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
